Description:
You encounter a white construct with a hammer hitting an anvil and next to it you can see an inactive Oddball. As you approach it it says to you:

"Fear not, I am a blacksmith who loves working with platinum, right now I was trying to fix this Oddball, but I lack another type of metal to fix its damaged dark side.

I'm also very good at forging magical items, like this platinum ring that you can keep, but if you give me some kind of rare material I'll make you something even more impressive."
DescriptionAction: Do you have something he can use to forge an item?
